title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at School Sisters of Notre Dame (Mankato, MN) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was so scared at first because it was my first interview. But then it turned to be a great interview because I turned it into a conversation instead of questions and answers.
Interview Questions: Describe diversity in one word without using the word ''different''.

title: Media Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at School Sisters of Notre Dame (Towson, MD)
Interview Descriptions: It was multiple interviews. It started off with a few phone interviews and then an in person interview. After the in person interview, they walked me around to show me the facility and to talk to the sister.
Interview Questions: Are you willing to do more than social media and also serves as a journalist?
